NetSparkleUpdater.​AssemblyAccessors.​AssemblyReflectionAccessor
NetSparkleUpdater.​Interfaces.​IAssemblyAccessor
public
NetSparkleUpdater.​AssemblyAccessors.​AssemblyReflectionAccessor

An assembly accessor that uses reflection to learn information on an assembly with a given name.

Variables
_assembly
private Assembly _assembly
_assemblyAttributes
private List<Attribute> _assemblyAttributes
Functions
AssemblyReflectionAccessor
public AssemblyReflectionAccessor(
string assemblyName
)

Create the assembly accessor with a given assembly name. All pertinent attributes that are needed are read during object construction.

Parameter
assemblyName
string

the assembly name.  If null is passed,  is used to get info on the asembly.

Exceptions
FileNotFoundException

Thrown when the path to the assembly with the given name doesn't exist

ArgumentNullException

Thrown when the assembly can't be loaded

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown when the assembly doesn't have any readable attributes

private Attribute CreateAttribute(
CustomAttributeData data
)

This methods creates an attribute instance from the attribute data information
